articles.title: Ultimate Table Tennis: Harmeet, Robles star as Goa Challengers crowned Season 4 champions - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Goa Challengers pipped defending champions Chennai Lions to the crown by a narrow 8-7 scoreline.
articles.content:
Goa Challengers defeated holders Chennai Lions in a final that went down to the last game to win the fourth edition of Ultimate Table Tennis in Pune on Sunday.
